header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Code of dress at work; the walk and lunch in the pub beforehand; clocks going back; price of candles; early morning deliveries; parking and traffic jam problems to/from place of work; food bought in Lidl; Jamie Oliverâ€™s 15 minute meals; a new jumper from Zara; the warmth of the room; sharing round mini-muffins; beards; Metrology department at work; slide rules; Halloween

speaker.fls: Greek -- level unspecified; Mandarin -- level unspecified; Spanish -- level unspecified
Italian -- level unspecified; Spanish -- level unspecified; Greek -- level unspecified; French -- level unspecified
